DataType.name: Unspecified
DataType.comment: A default type indicating 'no type set'

SubType.name: FixedLength
SubType.comment: A fixed length text data type

SubType.name: VariableLength
SubType.comment: A variable length text data type

SubType.name: LargeLength
SubType.comment: A large length text data type

SubType.name: SignedInteger
SubType.comment: A signed integer numeric data type

SubType.name: UnsignedInteger
SubType.comment: An unsigned integer numeric data type

SubType.name: AutoCounter
SubType.comment: An auto counter numeric data type

SubType.name: FloatingPoint
SubType.comment: A floating point numeric data type

SubType.name: Decimal
SubType.comment: A decimal numeric data type

SubType.name: Money
SubType.comment: A money numeric data type

SubType.name: FixedLength
SubType.comment: A fixed length raw data data type

SubType.name: VariableLength
SubType.comment: A variable length raw data data type

SubType.name: LargeLength
SubType.comment: A large length raw data data type

SubType.name: Picture
SubType.comment: A picture raw data data type

SubType.name: OleObject
SubType.comment: An OLE object raw data data type

SubType.name: AutoTimestamp
SubType.comment: An auto timestamp temporal data type

SubType.name: Time
SubType.comment: A time temporal data type

SubType.name: Date
SubType.comment: A date temporal data type

SubType.name: DateAndTime
SubType.comment: A date and time temporal data type

SubType.name: TrueOrFalse
SubType.comment: A true or false logical data type

SubType.name: YesOrNo
SubType.comment: A yes or no logical data type

SubType.name: RowId
SubType.comment: A row id data type (can not be classified in any of the groups above)

SubType.name: ObjectId
SubType.comment: An object id data type (can not be classified in any of the groups above)

DataType.name: UserDefined
DataType.comment: Used for the upper bounds of the enum values.
